website_summaries.verdict: The safest way to enjoy a margarita by the pool or at the cottage.
pros: The DECO margarita glasses are made from a high quality plastic
The glasses will never shatter and we were impressed to find they were dishwasher safe as well
There is a simple, elegant design and a lightweight feel
Safe to usearound the pool and easy to pack up for a camping trip
cons: There is a visible seem in the plastic stem

customer_reviews.title: it really makes it top heavy and easy to spill
customer_reviews.text: Decided to get these so we didn't need to worry about breaking glasses. Unfortunately, these are so light weight, when you fill the glass with tasty margarita, it really makes it top heavy and easy to spill, again and again and again. It took me about three sips to give up and pour my drink in a regular glass.
customer_reviews.author: Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: These are really made of a type of plastic. You can see the seam. They work fine but I wouldn't give them as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Ariagne

customer_reviews.title: Thick Durable Material
customer_reviews.text: Waited a few months to have time to use and wash them a bit before reviewing. So far, so good! Bought them for dining/relaxing out on our patio and in the pool, and I’m happy with my purchase. Good, thick material that isn’t easily scratched. We even took them to the beach and had them set down in the sand, and they still look brand new!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the sole purpose of taking them to our local BYO Mexican Restaurant. They serve the purpose; however, I wish I had gotten the removable stem ones for easier transport. That being said, these are much sturdier than the removable stem ones our friends bring.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: One piece, clear, light weight
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for something heavier but at least they are not a 2 piece thing where the bottom keeps coming off. I've only used it a few times and it hasn't cracked. It is very light.
customer_reviews.author: Erieside

customer_reviews.title: Not for me. Don’t really like it.
customer_reviews.text: The syrup doesn’t stick well so if you don’t like salt on the rim then you’re good. Also it doesn’t balance well in your had when there is liquid in it. But seems good
customer_reviews.author: Msbrannan

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive set.
customer_reviews.text: I like the "Margarita" look, size and weight. They are non-breakable, and dishwasher safe. I would prefer glass, but for the price, durability, and dishwasher safe, a really good bargain.
customer_reviews.author: R onH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for outdoor parties
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for good margarita glasses that were not made of glass; finally found these. They are lightweight, sturdy and a perfect size for mixed and/or frozen summer drinks on the patio.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful glasses!
customer_reviews.text: Love these, these are the only ones I’ve found being bpa free. Wish they were a little thicker in material but overall they are very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality for plastic. Great for traveling in the trailer.
customer_reviews.author: barbara

customer_reviews.title: Almost too lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Lovely and clear, but a bit too light-weight, as they feel top-heavy and flimsy in the hand.
customer_reviews.author: Normandie

customer_reviews.title: Smaller sized
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought they would be. Order the larger size instead.
customer_reviews.author: isabella biringer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't think they were plastic
customer_reviews.text: They will be functional, however I thought I was getting margarita GLASSES not PLASTICS. way to trash up the whole classy party vibe
customer_reviews.author: David McCullough

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. We use them all the time and run them through the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Weakly

customer_reviews.title: they look and feel like disposable plastic glasses
customer_reviews.text: These are nothing more than cheap plastic, they look and feel like disposable plastic glasses. They even have visible seams down the sides. They neither look nor feel like glass. Don't be fooled! These are a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Plastic expensive garbage
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the reviews. These are ugly plastic cups. There is a seem on one side that looks really cheap. There is no way I would have paid 20 bucks for this garbage if I knew it was plastic. Guess it’s my fault for assuming margarita “glasses” would be glass.
customer_reviews.author: P Anglea

customer_reviews.title: They are Martini glasses and not Margarita glasses
customer_reviews.text: I had hoped to use these for serving margaritas. The box said there were four MARTINI glasses inside and the box label was correct. I already had martini glasses and liked them. They are well-built martini glasses...still not margarita styled. :(
customer_reviews.author: MicJay

customer_reviews.title: Great margarita glasses to use by the pool or beach.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to have by the pool. Great quality even though plastic. Perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: I read the reviews so I knew these were not ...
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews so I knew these were not glass. They worked perfectly for a small get-together we had. They are an adequate size.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra L. Gavilan

customer_reviews.title: Great party fun without the worries!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses! When I received my 2nd order of these glasses there was small imperfection on one of them. I wrote to the company and they sent me an entire new order right away. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: SuziQ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Patio
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like glass and holds the perfect amount of Margarita!
customer_reviews.author: DaMull

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They're nice glasses, I just feel like their a little overpriced for what they are.
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: Nice for basket
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a wedding margarita basket. Attractive but not breakable.
customer_reviews.author: Joan M. Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Thick
customer_reviews.text: They were a bit thicker than I expected and wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Warren

customer_reviews.title: Great for pool
customer_reviews.text: These were a good size for Margaritas and did not have to worry about breakage. Dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Blunt

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super light glasses, but that's want you want when RVing.
customer_reviews.author: rhs

customer_reviews.title: These are the best things ever
customer_reviews.text: These are the best things ever ! Look and feel of great quality except you don’t have to be scared of glasses breaking! I couldn’t recommend them any higher
customer_reviews.author: tanaVilar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these high quality glasses. Used them for a Cinco de Mayo party.
customer_reviews.author: siaia

product_meta.title: Unbreakable Margarita Glasses - 100% Tritan - Shatterproof, Reusable, Dishwasher Safe (Set of 4)
feature_bullets: Shatterproof, reusable, and dishwasher safe beer glasses - BPA Free
Each Margarita Glass is made from 100% Tritan, a durable plastic like material
Looks like real glassware. Elegant, but won't shatter or break like glass
Extremely durable, dishwasher safe and will not cloud like plastic

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars110 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
